talks.name: Joshua
talks.job: I can help.
talks.answer2: If the eight philosophies of avatarhood combine into and are made from truth, love & courage...
talks.yesanswer: What one thing creates and is created by all truths, all love & all courage?
talks.noanswer: Oh.

talks.name: Landri
talks.job: I am here to warn thee!
talks.heal: I am fine, but thou must go back!
talks.answer2: Once thou enters thou may not return whence thee came!
talks.yesanswer: Then thou art doomed!
talks.noanswer: That is good.

talks.name: a guard
talks.job: A guard
talks.answer1: We guard the castle and its treasures.
talks.answer2: That is not your business.
talks.yesanswer: I believe you will find that an unfruitful venture.
talks.noanswer: Then please leave at once!

talks.name: a guard
talks.job: I guard the castle and all within.
talks.answer2: The castle is fair and strong!
talks.yesanswer: He is on the upper level in the throne room.
talks.noanswer: He will aid you if you are in need!

talks.name: a guard
talks.job: I guard the castle and all within.
talks.answer2: The castle is fair and strong!
talks.yesanswer: He is on the upper level in the throne room.
talks.noanswer: He will aid you if you are in need!

talks.answer2: The castle is fair and strong!
talks.yesanswer: He is on the upper level in the throne room.
talks.noanswer: He will aid you if you are in need!

talks.name: Sheila
talks.job: I search for the inner light.
talks.answer1: Seek inner light in the shrines!
talks.answer2: Runes are needed to enter shrines!
talks.yesanswer: Good.
talks.noanswer: The mantra are chants needed to focus thy thoughts while meditating.

talks.name: Chuckles
talks.job: I am the royal jester
talks.answer2: Speak ye unto the waters of the well and ask of altars!
talks.yesanswer: Then enter in peace!
talks.noanswer: Then why art thou here?

talks.name: Seesha
talks.job: I fight for my country.
talks.answer2: Britannia.
talks.yesanswer: Then seek out the smith named Zircon in Minoc for he made the mystic arms, only they will save thee in the abyss!
talks.noanswer: Hmm.

talks.name: a guard
talks.job: I guard the castle and all within.
talks.answer2: The castle is fair and strong!
talks.yesanswer: He is on the upper level in the throne room.
talks.noanswer: He will aid you if you are in need!

talks.name: Shawn
talks.look: A shepherdess both strong and beautiful.
talks.job: I watch the water.
talks.answer2: I come from a proud city.
talks.yesanswer: Hmmm.
talks.noanswer: My towne was destroyed for its pride. The ruins lie on an isle at lat-K'J" long-L'L"!

talks.name: Water
talks.job: I hold a secret.
talks.answer2: There are three altar rooms which connect the bottom levels of all eight dungeons!
talks.yesanswer: If the correct colors of stones are used in the altars, a key of three parts can be gained!
talks.noanswer: Oh.
